hero.title: Predictable pricing for high-value intelligence.
hero.description: Start with a single signal or scale to a full monitoring suite. All plans include a one-time implementation fee to configure your custom signal intake.

overview.title: Choose the number of Signals you need to track.
overview.description: Every plan includes the core SotA platform. Simply choose the volume of signals you need to monitor to keep your roadmap ahead of the market.
overview.note: All prices are in USD and billed monthly. Implementation fee applies to the initial setup.

plans.name: 1 Signal
plans.description: Perfect for focused monitoring of a single critical signal.

plans.name: 3+1 Signals
plans.description: Expand your coverage with 3 standard signals and 1 custom signal.

plans.name: 5+1 Signals
plans.description: Comprehensive monitoring with 5 standard signals and 1 custom signal.

plans.name: Custom Signals
plans.description: Full signals-on-demand platform for large organizations.

included.title: Every plan includes
items: Unlimited access to historical releases and playbooks
Live updates when a research line shifts
Support from the SotA Research team inside the platform

contact.title: Need a custom bundle?
contact.description: Tell us how many research lines you want to operate and we will tailor the bundle for your workflow.
